wikipedia_page.main: James Morton (22 August 1885 – 29 July 1926) was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Hibernian, Bradford City, Stoke City, Tottenham Hotspur, St Bernard's, Bathgate, Barnsley and Bristol City.

response: * Sir James Morton (chemist) (1867–1943), Scottish chemist, creator of light-fast dyes
* James Morton (Canadian businessman) (1808–1864), Irish-born brewer, manufacturer and politician
* James Morton (physician), Australian physician and autism advocate
